id.comment: Find while loops with assignment to variable count

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select w such that Parent* (w, a) pattern a ("count", _)

id.comment: Find assignments that use and modify the same variable

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses (a, v) pattern a (v, _)

id.comment: Find assignments that use and modify the variable x

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a ("x", _) such that Uses (a, "x")

id.comment: Find assignments that use and modify the variable x

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses (a, "x") pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Find assignments that are nested directly

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) pattern a ("count", _)
assign a; while w; Select a pattern a ("count", _) such that Parent* (w, a)

id.comment: Find all assignments nested in if loops that use and change cenX

query.querystr: if i; assign a; Select i such that Parent* (i, a) pattern a ("cenX", _"cenX"_)
